skills.name: Thorny Rose
skills.description: [SP: 13][CD: 8s] Blink and appear behind the target foe to deal 400%+8*50% ATK of Physical DMG to all nearby enemies.

skills.name: Marigold's Luck
skills.description: The wielder deals 20% bonus Physical DMG. Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) deal 200% ATK of Physical DMG to nearby enemies on hit. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 4.0s, and its Crit Rate increases by 100% against MECH-type enemies.
